column3: @mrwhythat thanks for your contribution. I've taken a look at the code and it looks like a good start to #10929 but I have some doubts about the overall concept. My comments are here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/10929#issuecomment-329607560
From discussion in #10929, it's unclear whether this PR should be continued or not. Any suggestions?

Hi @mrwhythat - sorry. I really didn't want to discourage you on your first PR. Your first commits look good, but my view of #10929 is that there are a lot of edge cases to think about before this will be in a useful state. I don't see huge benefit from the feature, but there may be others who do.\n\nFor me there are much more interesting features to be worked on, but I certainly wouldn't concep
Ok, then I'm closing this PR, but I'll leave the branch in case it's needed some time in the future.
